(a) A = A + B
	00 001 010 0010 0000
	B = A - B
	00 001 010 0100 0110
	A<<1
	00 001 000 0111 0000
	A<<1
	00 001 000 0111 0000
	A = A - B
	00 001 010 0100 0000
	RET_SET
	00 000 011 0001 0111

(b) H = 8
	11 00 1111 1111 1011
	MAR = H
	00 000 101 0001 0101
	MAR = MAR - 1
	00 011 011 0100 0101
	READ = 1 (MDR = MEM[MAR])
	00 000 011 0001 1100
	H = 4
	11 00 1111 1111 1100
	A = H
	00 000 101 0001 0000
	H = 8
	11 00 1111 1111 1011
	A = A + H
	00 001 101 0010 0000
	A = A + 1
	00 001 011 0010 0000
	MDR = MDR + A
	00 001 000 0010 0100
	H = 2
	11 00 1111 1111 1101
	MAR = H
	00 000 101 0001 0101
	H = 8
	11 00 1111 1111 1100
	MAR = MAR + H
	00 011 101 0010 0101
	MAR = MAR + 1
	00 011 011 0010 0101
	WRITE = 1 (MEM[MAR] = MDR)
	00 000 011 0001 1101
	RET_SET
	00 000 011 0001 0111

(C) IF A > 0
	0X10	01 0000 00 0001 0011
	A = IX + 1
	0X11	00 100 100 0010 0000
	RET_SET
	0X12	00 000 011 0001 0111
	A = IX
	0X13	00 000 100 0001 0000
	A << 1
	0X14	00 001 010 0010 0000
	A = A + IX
	0X15	00 001 100 0010 0000
	RET_SET
	0X16	00 000 011 0001 0111
